stand down.translation[0].definitions[0]: to agree to leave your position or to stop trying to be elected, so that someone else can have a chance
He was obliged to stand down as a parliamentary candidate.
stand down.translation[0].definitions[1]: to leave the witness box in a court of law
stand down.translation[0].definitions[2]: if a soldier stands down or is stood down, he stops working for the day
